content: Phase 1 Setup: Create implementation branch and backup
Phase 1.1-1.9: Implement and commit Incremental OHLC
Phase 1.10: Create spike test for Incremental OHLC validation
Phase 1.11: Run spike test to verify 95% speedup claim
activeForm: Ready to validate incremental vs full regeneration

content: Phase 1.12: Update implementation or revert based on results
activeForm: Adjusting based on spike test findings

content: Phase 2.0: Create spike test for Session Vectorization
Phase 2.1: Run spike test to verify 224x speedup claim
Phase 2.2: Implement Session Vectorization if spike test passes
Phase 2.3: Verify all 10 exchanges match
Phase 2.4: Run full test suite
Phase 2.5: Commit Phase 2 if validated
Phase 3.0: Create spike test for SQL Gap Detection
Phase 3.1: Run spike test to verify complexity reduction
Phase 3.2: Implement SQL Gap Detection if spike test passes

Phase 3.4: Commit Phase 3 if validated

Phase 4.3: Commit Phase 4 if validated

Phase 9: Final commit with comprehensive results
